M0000-1.question: Have you suffered from or suffering with CHF,cardiomyopathy,arrhythmia,chest pain,MI,CAD,HTN,PVD,Murmur?
M0000-1.instructions: if patient is has any of these, select true as the value otherwise false

M0000-2.instructions: if patient has it, select Y as the value otherwise N
